title: BIT.TRIP RERUNNER Free Download
description:
BIT.TRIP is back as BIT.TRIP RERUNNER + RUNNER MAKER! The classic rhythm platformer just got revamped with new mechanics, trippy visuals, and a killer soundtrack – plus a level editor for aspiring game designers.
The RUNNER MAKER empowers players to create and share custom levels. Indulge your imagination as you adjust obstacles and shape beat-driven gameplay – and then share your levels with the community. Inspire and be inspired as your fellow designers explore this limitless rhythm gaming adventure.
Why have one soundtrack when you can enjoy eight? Every song from every BIT.TRIP title makes an appearance in BIT.TRIP RERUNNER + RUNNER MAKER! Keep an ear to the ground for your favorite chiptune beats from BEAT, CORE, VOID, FATE, FLUX, RUNNER, Runner2, and Runner3 The End Is Nigh

system_requirements.Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or better
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 / AMD R9 280 or better
